name: node-merlin-wrt-api
description: An npm package to retrieve data and send commands to an asus Router running Merlin WRT
author: Thiemo Hoffmann

scripts.full-test: npm run lint-check-all && npm run jest-coverage
scripts.pre-release-check: npm run build && npm run full-test
scripts.release-patch-pre: npm run pre-release-check && npm run release prerelease --
scripts.release-patch: npm run pre-release-check && npm run release patch --
scripts.release-minor: npm run pre-release-check && npm run release minor --
scripts.release-major: npm run pre-release-check && npm run release major --
